about_the_game: In this DLC, colonists can operate on the planet surface. With new buildings such as science campuses and cyber bays for them to work in. A new threat: Sandstorms! It will gradually destroy the connections between buildings - pipes, cables and conveyors. To repair them, you'll need to build repair robots in the cyber bays. Colonists are now able to buy plastal for their personal needs and a food system will be introduced for the scientists. This is an important step in restoring human traditions, but it also creates difficulties, as it is necessary to cultivate food in greenhouses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB of Video RAM, NVIDIA GeForce 6600 or better, ATI Radeon X1300 or better, Intel GMA X4500 or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7 or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB of Video RAM, NVIDIA GTX 650, AMD Radeon HD 7750, or better
